## Trove.recreate() method

Calculate the parameters of an [openTrove()](./lib-base.transactableliquity.opentrove.md) transaction that will result in the given Trove.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static recreate(that: any, borrowingRate: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  that | any | The Trove to recreate. |
|  borrowingRate | any | Current borrowing rate. |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
